section.name: Welcome to Wicket-Dojo
section.p: The powerful and easy-to-use Object-Orriented Web framework wicket meets Dojo, a javascript toolkit which let's you make your webapps even more useable, responsive, and functional. This includes graphical decorations, AJAX functionality and other javascript enhancements.

ul.li: Read our weblog or some Wicket blogs

section.p: Wicket is released under the Apache License, Version 2.0.

section.name: Latest News

subsection.name: November 25, 2005 - Contrib-dojo v0.3 released!
subsection.p:
We are proud to announce that version 0.3 of our library has been released. It now contains actual useable components. ;)
Fully customizable Tooltip Component (non-dojo)
DojoFX Component decorators
FXFeedbackIndicator component (non-dojo)
FXValidationAjaxHandler
Check-out our tutorial section or our Tutorials or our javadoc section for more info on the components.

section.p: See the news archive for more (older) news.

section.name: Special Thanks
section.p: We would like to thank Wicket and the entire community for making such a cool framwork. And Dojo for being the coolest javascript toolkit out there. And my dog....

div.style: DISPLAY: none; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 7pt; COLOR: black; FONT-FAMILY: 'Verdana'; HEIGHT: 15px
